scripts.dist: npm run dist-bundle && npm run dist-sa && npm run docs-html && npm run docs-readme
scripts.dist-bundle: browserify src/main.js -o dist/awc.bundle.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch-bundle: watchify src/main.js -o dist/awc.bundle.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.dist-sa: browserify src/main.js -o dist/awc.standalone.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone awc
scripts.watch-sa: watchify src/main.js -o dist/awc.standalone.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone awc
